lyric:
[by:赵轱辘]
[00:01.13]Blaze up a cup for all of my day wants
[00:15.78]Two middle fingers for the haters
[00:18.41]Life's only getting greater
[00:21.21]Stayin' up for nothing
[00:23.46]We go higher than a high skyscraper
[00:27.44]Only the league we major
[00:30.55]That proof is in the paper
[00:34.86]We put the good in the good in the good life
[00:37.93]We put the good in the good in the good life
[00:40.93]We put the bad in the best, now we're alright
[00:44.15]Hey hey hey yeah hey
[01:41.62]Blaze up a cup for all of my day wants
[01:44.59]Two middle fingers for the haters
[01:47.51]Life's only getting greater
[01:50.51]Stayin' up for nothing
[01:52.09]We go higher than a high skyscraper
[01:56.30]Only the league we major
[01:59.38]That proof is in the paper
[02:03.88]We put the good in the good in the good life
[02:06.80]We put the good in the good in the good life
[02:09.80]We put the bad in the best, now we're alright
[02:29.22]
tlyric:
[by:周子矜]
[00:01.13]突然想起我想要的时光
[00:15.78]双竖中指递给那些怀恨在心的人们
[00:18.41]生活越来越好
[00:21.21]从一无所有中日趋繁荣昌盛
[00:23.46]飞的比摩天大楼还高
[00:27.44]只有两人的比赛
[00:30.55]白纸黑字写得清楚
[00:34.86]我们将美好写进美好生活
[00:37.93]我们将美好写进美好生活
[00:40.93]将不快过往丢在从前，就不再回头望
[00:44.15]嘿嘿嘿嘿
[01:41.62]突然想起我想要的时光
[01:44.59]双竖中指递给那些怀恨在心的人们
[01:47.51]生活越来越好

[01:56.30]只有两人的比赛
[01:59.38]白纸黑字写得清楚
